work-item.field:
Question items will be used by users to track all their question regarding process questions, Polarion question, etc. inside of a single project. During the training we will additionally add custom fields, link roles, workflows, etc. to this item.
  • Open Administration>Work Items>Types>
  • Add a new work item type question and remove all existing work items beside tasks
    • ID: question
    • Name: Question
    • Icon: any
    • Description: Questions will be used to track questions of users during projects about all sorts of questions
    • Default: unchecked
    • Color: none
  • Verify that this new item can be created in your project frontend
Hint: Work Item templates can be used to have e.g. some predefined description. To use this functionality:
  • Create a work item of this type in your frontend
  • Add the predefined data
  • Select this work item back in administration by using the work item picker
  • Now each new work item will have this data as default
